A strong jab that has a 30% chance to push the enemy back.
Acquiring <Y_Y>Chaos Drain</Y_Y> (at level 3) allows you to absorb 5 chaos when using this skill.
Acquiring <Y_Y>Chaos Boost</Y_Y> (at level 6) allows you to absorb an additional 15 chaos when using this skill.
<O_Y>Critical hits destabilize the enemy.</O_Y>

Lança uma seta poderosa de caos concentrado.
Estágio de Carga 2: Causa 60% de bônus de dano. Carga Completa: Causa 120% de bônus de dano e fere todos os inimigos em um raio de 4m.
Adquirir <Y_Y>Toque do Corvo</Y_Y> (no nível 15) causa confusão aos alvos.

Delivers two strong kicks to an enemy.
Kick 1: Absorbs 20 chaos. Kick 2: Activates the <Y_Y>Ruin's Protection</Y_Y> effect, which increases physical defense by 10% for 5 seconds.
Once you've acquired <Y_Y>Chaotic Spirits</Y_Y> (at level 23), attacking dazed enemies with this skill will reduce their defense by 20% for 5 seconds.
<O_Y>Critical hits destabilize the enemy.</O_Y>

Olhar do Ceifeiro

The spirit of the reaper walks with you, bestowing his own power upon you, enabling you to destroy your enemies.
Increases your evasion within 10m by 80% for 10 seconds when summoned.
If you have the Pandemonium, Order from Chaos, or Soul of Ruin talents equipped, the reaper heals 2% HP for all allies every 2 seconds for 10 seconds.
Se você equipar os talentos Sanguinário Caótico, Atirador de Elite ou Insígnia do Caçador, o ceifeiro aumenta seu dano crítico mágico em 1500.
Se você equipar os talentos Intimidação, Golpes Esmagadores ou Golpe Estratégico, o ceifeiro aumentará sua defesa global em 30%.
Tiro do Corvo
Tiro do Corvo
Tiro do Corvo

Fires a pair of arrows guided by the watchful eye of the raven.
Hit 1: Hits all enemies within 3m if the target is dazed. Hit 2: Hits all enemies within 4m of the target and activates Bedlam, which increases attack by 10% and move speed by 5% for 10 seconds.
If <Y_Y>Chaos Infusion</Y_Y> is activated while Bedlam is active, restores 20 chaos and 2% HP.

Salto à Frente
Allows you to get back in the fight when you're disabled or stunned. Can be used while knocked down.
Infusão Caótica
Fills you with a sudden rush of chaos, allowing you to unleash a powerful attack determined by your stance.
Bow Stance: Shoots successive volleys of arrows. Hit 2: Deals 30% bonus damage. Hit 3: Deals 80% bonus damage. Vambrace Stance: Damages all enemies within 4m and knocks them down for 5 seconds.

Golpe aos Céus

Channels the forces of ruin through your body to improve your chaos recovery.

Impulso Caótico

Boosts skills through the power of chaos.
Increases the combo count of <Y_Y>Chaos Arrow</Y_Y> to 4. The fourth hit costs extra chaos and deals extra damage.
Increases the chaos absorption of <Y_Y>Crushing Strike</Y_Y> by 15.

The great raven gifts you new effects on your skills.
<Y_Y>Double Strike</Y_Y> gains a 30% chance to daze enemies for 3 seconds.
<Y_Y>Ruin Arrow</Y_Y> gains a 70% chance to daze enemies for 1 second on stages 1 and 2. Stage 3 knocks down enemies and dazes them for 3 seconds.

"Transforme-se com a habilidade dada por Belhira.
- Invencibilidade por 3 segundos. - Instantaneamente regenera 50% de Vida quando transformado. - Durante a transformação, a <G_Y>[Evolução do Despertar]</G_Y> é ativada. <G_Y>[Evolução do Despertar]</G_Y>: Aumenta Resistência, Vida Máxima, Ataque Global, Defesa Global e Evasão.
[Durante a transformação, ative o combo de habilidade] "

- <Y_Y>[Duel Time]</Y_Y> (11 combo): Fires a fast and powerful arrow to the target (up to 5Lv level) <R_Y>Depending on the time skill level of the duel, the rate of increase in attack power varies, and you can level up through BELLHIRA's secret book.</R_Y>
- Each time you hit the combo, you will get a <G_Y>[Rush of Bellhira]</G_Y> buff.

<G_Y>[Rage of BELLHIRA]</G_Y> : Increases all ATK, all armor, and bleed rate. <R_Y>Depending on the time skill level of the duel, the effect of the anger of the bell hill increases, and you can level up through the secret book of bell hill.</R_Y>

- At the last combat hit <Y_Y>[Dueling Time]</Y_Y> Reduces the skill's cooldown, HP instant recovery effect occurs, and the target has a stiffness effect. <R_Y>Increases in effectiveness depending on the time skill level of the duel, and can be leveled up through BELLHILA's secret book.</R_Y>
